title: Harley-Davidson - motorcycle sales by region 2017/2018
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 5 lines denoting U.S., Canada, Europe, Middle East, Africa (EMEA), Asia-Pacific, and Latin America. The y axis indicates the Retail sales in units and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall U.S. is gradually decreasing, Canada, Europe, Middle East, Africa (EMEA), Asia-Pacific, and Latin America are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, U.S. mostly maintained the highest Retail sales in units when compared to others with a mean value of 140420.0, and it peaked at 2017.
After U.S., Europe, Middle East, Africa (EMEA) overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 45768.5, peaking at 2018.
Latin America mostly had the least Retail sales in units with a mean value of 9809.5, which peaked at 2018 with a value of 10167.0.
